::nighlight/windlord::

nighlight felt when she was pu inside cr, soon she was getting sleep 
and she didn't resist. in few cycles she deeply was sleeping .

Windlord stoond up when he saw at Aerotaur arrives and  the hwak 
said "maybe i can help... but could be dangerous.. i know where we 
can get weapons... or as new home if you rather.."
